summary: This document outlines the Articles of Organization for a limited liability company named Hyperion Air, LLC, established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It details the roles of the organizer and manager, as well as the company's purpose and liability limitations.

persons.name: Erika A. Katherhal
persons.context: Erika A. Katherhal is identified as the organizer of Hyperion Air, LLC, and is responsible for signing the Articles of Organization.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoald
persons.context: Lawrence Visoald is named as the initial manager of Hyperion Air, LLC.

connections.description: Erika A. Katherhal, as the organizer, appoints Lawrence Visoald as the manager of the company.

events.title: Formation of Hyperion Air, LLC
events.description: The Articles of Organization for Hyperion Air, LLC were signed and filed, establishing the company in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

locations: 9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00002
keyFacts: The document establishes Hyperion Air, LLC as a limited liability company in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Erika A. Katherhal is the organizer and has signed the Articles of Organization.
Lawrence Visoald is appointed as the initial manager of the company.
The company is organized for any lawful purpose under the Uniform Limited Liability Company Act.
The company begins business with a capital of $1,000.
